flag.oil

Physical properties of oil.

flag.oil.bubble_point_pressure(T, G, rho0, Rs, model='rpl')

Bubble point pressure of oil [MPa].

Application conditions:

Parameters:

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • G (TFVec) – Gas gravity

  • rho0 (TFVec) – Oil density at STP [g/cm^3]

  • Rs (TFVec) – Gas oil ratio [L/L]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate bubble point pressure. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Bubble point pressure of oil mixture [MPa].

Return type:

TFVec

flag.oil.bulk_modulus(P, T, G, rho0, Rs, model='rpl')

Bulk modulus of oil mixture [GPa].

Application conditions:

  1. Pressure [MPa] : Bubble point <= P <= 120

  2. Temperature [C] : 20 <= T <= 100

  3. Gas gravity : 0 <= G <= 600

  4. API gravity [L/L] : 20 <= Rs <= 80

Parameters:

  • P (TFVec) – Pressure [MPa]

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • G (TFVec) – Gas gravity

  • rho0 (TFVec) – Oil density at STP [g/cm^3]

  • Rs (TFVec) – Gas oil ratio [L/L]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate bulk modulus. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Bulk modulus of oil mixture [GPa].

Return type:

TFVec

flag.oil.density(P, T, G, rho0, Rs, model='rpl')

Density of oil [g/cm^3].

Application conditions:

  1. Pressure [MPa] : Bubble point <= P <= 120

  2. Temperature [C] : 20 <= T <= 100

  3. API gravity [L/L] : 20 <= Rs <= 80

Parameters:

  • P (TFVec) – Pressure [MPa]

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • G (TFVec) – Gas gravity

  • rho0 (TFVec) – Oil density at STP [g/cm^3]

  • Rs (TFVec) – Gas oil ratio [L/L]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate density. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Density of oil [g/cm^3].

Return type:

TFVec

flag.oil.velocity(P: FVec, T: FVec, G: FVec, rho0: FVec, Rs: FVec, model: str = 'rpl') → FVec

Velocity of oil [km/s].

Application conditions:

  1. Pressure [MPa] : Bubble point <= P <= 150

  2. Temperature [C] : 20 <= T <= 170

  3. Oil density at STP : 0.669 <= rho0 <= 0.933 API gravity : 20 <= rho0 <= 80

  4. Gas-oil ratio [L/L] : 0 <= Rs <= 600

Parameters:

  • P (TFVec) – Pressure [MPa]

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • G (TFVec) – Gas gravity

  • rho0 (TFVec) – Oil density at STP [g/cm^3]

  • Rs (TFVec) – Gas-oil ratio [L/L]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate velocity. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Velocity of oil mixture [km/s].

Return type:

TFVec

flag.oil.viscosity(P, T, G, rho0, Rs, model='rpl')

Viscosity of oil [cP].

Application conditions:

  1. Pressure [MPa] : Bubble point <= P <= 36

  2. Temperature [C] : 20 <= T <= 146

  3. Gas gravity : 5 <= T <= 146

Parameters:

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • Sa (TFVec) – Salinity [ppm]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate viscosity. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Viscosity of oil [cP].

Return type:

TFVec
